llm_res.rule: The function balanceOf(address _owner) external view returns (uint256); must be implemented to return the number of NFTs owned by `_owner`, possibly zero.
llm_res.function: The balanceOf function is missing in the provided ERC721 implementation.

llm_res.rule: allowance function should return the remaining number of tokens that the spender will be allowed to spend on behalf of the owner.
Callers MUST handle false from returns (bool success). Callers MUST NOT assume that false is never returned!
transferFrom function should return a boolean value indicating success or failure.
